short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This gives the AQI level in Shanghai

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension for those who need to know the AQI at current time. The extension comes with a key to tell you if the AQI level is healthy or not, which is useful when you're debating on leaving the indoors and wondering if you should be taking a mask with you or not. This will give quick access to the AQI without having to google the AQI level.
